active.description: Whether the navigation item is active.

blurActive.description: Whether the nested group is collapsed and there is an active nested item within it.

expanded.description: Whether the navigation item is expanded.

orientation.description: The orientation of the navigation item.

parent.description: Whether the navigation item is a parent with nested items.

render.type: ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | ((props: any) => ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>)
render.description: Render prop to enable customisation of navigation item element.

onExpand.description: Action to be triggered when the navigation item is expanded.

href.description: Href to be passed to the Link element.
